-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Typeclasses and instances for converting between types
--   
--   convertible provides a typeclass with a single function that is
--   designed to help convert between different types: numeric values,
--   dates and times, and the like. The conversions perform bounds checking
--   and return a pure Either value. This means that you need not remember
--   which specific function performs the conversion you desire.
--   
--   Also included in the package are optional instances that provide
--   conversion for various numeric and time types, as well as utilities
--   for writing your own instances.
--   
--   Finally, there is a function that will raise an exception on
--   bounds-checking violation, or return a bare value otherwise,
--   implemented in terms of the safer function described above.
--   
--   Convertible is also used by HDBC 2.0 for handling marshalling of data
--   to and from databases.
--   
--   Convertible is backed by an extensive test suite and passes tests on
--   GHC and Hugs.
@package convertible
@version 1.1.1.0


module Data.Convertible.Base

-- | Convert from one type of data to another. Raises an exception if there
--   is an error with the conversion. For a function that does not raise an
--   exception in that case, see <a>safeConvert</a>.
convert :: Convertible a b => a -> b

-- | A typeclass that represents something that can be converted. A
--   <tt>Convertible a b</tt> instance represents an <tt>a</tt> that can be
--   converted to a <tt>b</tt>.
class Convertible a b

-- | Convert <tt>a</tt> to <tt>b</tt>, returning Right on success and Left
--   on error. For a simpler interface, see <a>convert</a>.
safeConvert :: Convertible a b => a -> ConvertResult b

-- | The result of a safe conversion via <a>safeConvert</a>.
type ConvertResult a = Either ConvertError a

-- | How we indicate that there was an error.
data ConvertError
ConvertError :: String -> String -> String -> String -> ConvertError
[convSourceValue] :: ConvertError -> String
[convSourceType] :: ConvertError -> String
[convDestType] :: ConvertError -> String
[convErrorMessage] :: ConvertError -> String
convError :: (Show a, Typeable a, Typeable b) => String -> a -> ConvertResult b
prettyConvertError :: ConvertError -> String
instance GHC.Show.Show Data.Convertible.Base.ConvertError
instance GHC.Read.Read Data.Convertible.Base.ConvertError
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Data.Convertible.Base.ConvertError
instance Control.Monad.Trans.Error.Error Data.Convertible.Base.ConvertError


module Data.Convertible.Utils

-- | Utility function to perform bounds checking as part of a conversion.
--   
--   Does this be examining the bounds of the destination type, converting
--   to the type of the source via <a>safeConvert</a>, comparing to the
--   source value. Results in an error if the conversion is out of bounds.
boundedConversion :: (Ord a, Bounded b, Show a, Show b, Convertible a Integer, Convertible b Integer, Typeable a, Typeable b) => (a -> ConvertResult b) -> a -> ConvertResult b

-- | Useful for defining conversions that are implemented in terms of other
--   conversions via an intermediary type. Instead of:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance Convertible CalendarTime POSIXTime where
--       safeConvert a = do r &lt;- safeConvert a
--                          safeConvert (r :: ClockTime)
--   </pre>
--   
--   we can now write:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance Convertible CalendarTime POSIXTime where
--       safeConvert = convertVia (undefined::ClockTime)
--   </pre>
--   
--   which does the same thing -- converts a CalendarTime to a ClockTime,
--   then a ClockTime to a POSIXTime, both using existing
--   <a>Convertible</a> instances.
convertVia :: (Convertible a b, Convertible b c) => b -> a -> ConvertResult c


-- | Instances to convert between Map and association list.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009-2011 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Map
instance GHC.Classes.Ord k => Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [(k, a)] (Data.Map.Base.Map k a)
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible (Data.Map.Base.Map k a) [(k, a)]


-- | Numeric instances for Convertible.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009-2011 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
--   
--   These instances perform conversion between numeric types such as
--   Double, Int, Integer, Rational, and the like. Here are some notes
--   about the conversion process:
--   
--   Conversions from floating-point types such as Double to integral types
--   are done via the <a>truncate</a> function. This is a somewhat
--   arbitrary decision; if you need different behavior, you will have to
--   write your own instance or manually perform the conversion.
--   
--   All conversions perform bounds checking. If a value is too large for
--   its destination type, you will get a <a>ConvertError</a> informing you
--   of this. Note that this behavior differs from functions in the Haskell
--   standard libraries, which will perform the conversion without error,
--   but give you garbage in the end.
--   
--   Conversions do not perform precision checking; loss of precision is
--   implied with certain conversions (for instance, Double to Float) and
--   this is not an error.
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Num
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Types.Int
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Int GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Int.Int8
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Int.Int8 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Int.Int16
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Int.Int16 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Int.Int32
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Int.Int32 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Int.Int64
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Int.Int64 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Types.Word
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Word GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Word.Word8
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word8 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Word.Word16
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word16 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Word.Word32
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word32 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double GHC.Word.Word64
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word64 GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Float GHC.Types.Int

instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Float GHC.Int.Int8

instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Float GHC.Int.Int32
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Int.Int32 GHC.Types.Float
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Float GHC.Int.Int64
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Int.Int64 GHC.Types.Float
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Float GHC.Types.Word

instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word32 GHC.Types.Float
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Float GHC.Word.Word64

-- | Numeric instances for Convertible for C types. See comments in
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Num</a>.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009-2011 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
module Data.Convertible.Instances.C
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CFloat GHC.Types.Int

instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word64 Foreign.C.Types.CDouble

-- | Text instances for Convertible.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2011 MailRank, Inc. <a>bos@mailrank.com</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file COPYRIGHT
--   
--   These instances perform conversion between text-like types such as
--   Text, ByteString, and the like.
--   
--   The instances do <i>not</i> include conversions between ByteString and
--   Text or String, since such conversions cannot safely be performed
--   without knowing the encoding of the ByteString.
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Text [GHC.Types.Char]
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Text Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Text Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Text Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Text Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Text Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text [GHC.Types.Char]
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text Data.Text.Internal.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder [GHC.Types.Char]
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder Data.Text.Internal.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString [GHC.Word.Word8]
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString Data.Text.Internal.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString [GHC.Word.Word8]
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString Data.Text.Internal.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [GHC.Types.Char] Data.Text.Internal.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [GHC.Types.Char] Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [GHC.Types.Char] Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [GHC.Word.Word8] Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [GHC.Word.Word8] Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible [GHC.Word.Word8] Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Char Data.Text.Internal.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Char Data.Text.Internal.Lazy.Text
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Char Data.Text.Internal.Builder.Builder
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word8 Data.ByteString.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word8 Data.ByteString.Lazy.Internal.ByteString
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Word.Word8 Data.ByteString.Builder.Internal.Builder


-- | Instances to convert between various time structures, both old- and
--   new-style.
--   
--   At present, this module does not do full input validation. That is, it
--   is possible to get an exception rather than a Left result from these
--   functions if your input is invalid, particularly when converting from
--   the old-style System.Time structures.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009-2011 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Time
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.ClockTime System.Time.CalendarTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.CalendarTime System.Time.ClockTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.ClockTime GHC.Integer.Type.Integer
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Integer.Type.Integer System.Time.ClockTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Real.Rational Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Integer.Type.Integer Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Int Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime GHC.Integer.Type.Integer
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime GHC.Real.Rational
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime GHC.Types.Int
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Real.Rational Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Integer.Type.Integer Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Int Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime GHC.Real.Rational
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime GHC.Integer.Type.Integer
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime GHC.Types.Int
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.CalendarTime Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.CalendarTime Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.CalendarTime Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.ClockTime Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.ClockTime Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.ClockTime Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime System.Time.ClockTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime System.Time.ClockTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime System.Time.ClockTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime System.Time.CalendarTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime System.Time.CalendarTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime System.Time.CalendarTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.TimeDiff Data.Time.Clock.UTC.NominalDiffTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.NominalDiffTime System.Time.TimeDiff
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Integer.Type.Integer System.Time.TimeDiff
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double System.Time.TimeDiff
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.TimeDiff GHC.Integer.Type.Integer
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.TimeDiff GHC.Real.Rational
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.TimeDiff GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.POSIX.POSIXTime Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime GHC.Integer.Type.Integer
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Integer.Type.Integer Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime GHC.Types.Double
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Double Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime GHC.Types.Int
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible GHC.Types.Int Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.Clock.UTC.UTCTime Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime System.Time.ClockTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.ClockTime Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime System.Time.CalendarTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible System.Time.CalendarTime Foreign.C.Types.CTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Foreign.C.Types.CTime Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime
instance Data.Convertible.Base.Convertible Data.Time.LocalTime.LocalTime.ZonedTime Foreign.C.Types.CTime


-- | Collection of ready-made <a>Convertible</a> instances. See each
--   individual module for more docs:
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.C</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Map</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Num</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Time</a>
--   
--   You can find a list of these instances at <a>Convertible</a>.
module Data.Convertible.Instances


-- | This is a library to provide a uniform interface for safe conversions
--   between different types of data. To get started reading about it,
--   consult:
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Base</a> for information about the conversions
--   themselves
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Utils</a> for helpful tools for people writing
--   <a>Convertible</a> instances
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances</a> for a large collection of
--   ready-built <a>Convertible</a> instances
--   
--   You can import these modules individually, or this module will export
--   the entire library for you.
module Data.Convertible
